preferences.name: showStartDate
preferences.label: Show the "Start Date" field
preferences.description: When enabled, the "Start Date" field will be shown in the "Create Task" command.

preferences.name: shouldCloseMainWindow
preferences.label: Close window immediately
preferences.description: When enabled, the Raycast window is closed immediately, allowing you to carry on with other work.

preferences.name: showCompletedTasks
preferences.label: Show completed tasks
preferences.description: When enabled, the completed tasks will show up in the task list

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
